paper_abstract: The QXOR-SAT problem is the quantified version of the satisfiability problem XOR-SAT in which the connective exclusive- or is used instead of the usual or. We study the phase transition associated with random QXOR-SAT instances. We give a description of this phase transition in the case of one alternation of quantifiers, thus performing an advanced practical and theoretical study on the phase transition of a quantified problem.
paper_title: Phase transition for random quantified XOR-formulas
